timeline.message: Resolve the missing refs only after the aggregate tree is resolved
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch into subselect_unresolved_bugfix

timeline.author: bpintea

replies.author: costin

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch into subselect_unresolved_bugfix

timeline.bodyText: I don't think this is needed anymore - see AnalyzeRule which takes care of skipping if the node is resolved and skipResolved is true (default).
timeline.author: costin

timeline.bodyText: I'd pick a different name - maybe DefaultAnalyzeRule or BaseAnalyzeRule.
timeline.author: costin

replies.bodyText: I was struggling with the name, indeed. I didn't particularly like LogicalPlanAnalyzeRule, but didn't find any better alternatives.
replies.author: astefan

timeline.bodyText: rulePlan is repetitive (the method only accepts LogicalPlans)  - how about doRule or analyze?
timeline.author: costin

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch into subselect_unresolved_bugfix
